page-find-wallet-desc-2: Yu nor sabi wetin wallet bi?
page-find-wallet-description: Wallets store and transact yor ETH. Yu fit shuse from one variety of products wey dey guide yor nids.
page-find-wallet-meta-description: Find and kompia diferen ethereum wallets base on wetin yu wont.
page-find-wallet-try-removing: Try rimuv one abi two feature
page-find-wallet-open-source-desc: Open-sorse software dey alow anyone audit di integrity and sikurity of di aplikashon
page-find-wallet-non-custodial-desc: Wallets wey nor dey kontrol yor private keys
page-find-wallet-hardware-wallet-support: Wallets wey fit konet to hardware wallet to sekure am wella
page-find-wallet-rpc-importing-desc: Wallets wey dey suport kustom RPC finalplace to konet to difren nodes abi netwoks
page-find-wallet-nft-support-desc: Wallet wey dey suport viewin and dey interakt wit yor NFTs
page-find-wallet-connect-to-dapps-desc: Yu fit conet to aplikashons wey suppot WalletConnect abi anoda tin
page-find-wallet-staking-desc: Makw yu take ETH from di wallet diret
page-find-wallet-swaps-desc: Swap ERC-20 tokens wey dey inside di wallet diret
page-find-wallet-layer-2-desc: Wallet wey dey suport Ethereum Layer2s
page-find-wallet-gas-fee-customization-d: Do yur gas amounts make e dey as you like (base fee, priority fee, and max fee)
page-find-wallet-ens-support-desc: Wallet wey suport Ethereum Name Savis (ENS)
page-find-wallet-token-importing-desc: You fit impot any ERC-20 token wey yu go fit yus for di wallet
page-find-wallet-buy-crypto-desc:
Buy crypto wit normal moni from di wallet.
*Note say: to dey dey buy crypto fit base on di region wey yu dey stay
page-find-wallet-sell-for-fiat-desc:
Make yu sell crypto to normal in di wallet diret
*Note: to dey komot crypto fit bi region spesifik
page-find-wallet-multisig-desc: Wallet wey get plenti signatures sto konfam one transakshon
page-find-wallet-social-recovery-desc: Wallets wey gri make guardians shange di key dem dey yus sign for smart kontrat
page-find-wallet-showing-all-wallets: To dey show all di wallets
page-find-wallet-new-to-crypto-desc: First taim user dey look for begina wallet.
page-find-wallet-nfts-desc: Wallets wit fokus on NFT suppot.
page-find-wallet-hodler-desc: Passif token wey dey hold wit hardware wallets.
page-find-wallet-finance-desc: Wallets wey dey fokus on frequent usage of DeFi apps.
page-find-wallet-developer-desc: Wallets wey dey helep divelop and test dapps.
page-find-wallet-footnote-1: Wallets wey dem list for dis page nor get official endorsements, and dem dey provided only for informashional purposes.
page-find-wallet-footnote-2: Di wallet projects don already provide dia diskripshon demsefs.
page-find-wallet-footnote-3: Wi add products to dis page based on di kriteria wey dey inside awa listin policy. If yu go like add new wallet, yu fit raise issue for di GitHub.
page-find-wallet-empty-results-desc: Nor wallets dey matsh yor kriteria, try to dey rimuv some filtas.
